constraints.description: VAT registration mandatory if turnover exceeds 20,000 â‚¬
Employer registration mandatory for regular employers
Income tax must be withheld from wages
Information must be reported to income register within 5 days of payday
Advance tax should be adjusted immediately if financial situation changes
Payment to avoid residual tax and penalties
Accounting materials must be stored for 6 years from end of financial year
Use correct reference number in tax payments
Apply for payment arrangements before taxes go to enforcement
Business ID received immediately after electronic establishment notification
VAT payment due on 12th day of month in OmaVero
Advance tax due on 23rd day of month
Reduced VAT rates are 14% and 10% for specific sectors
Sickness insurance contribution must be paid by employer

metadata.title: Guide: Tax Information for New Entrepreneurs 2025
metadata.description: Summary of Tax Administration's instructions for establishing a company, registration and handling taxes in 2025
